actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill expanding the definition of the word "person" as used in the Constitution and the laws of the United States.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expands the definition of the word "person" as used in the Constitution and the laws of the United States to mean any combination of human cells capable of becoming or being an actual human entity.

titles.title: A bill expanding the definition of the word "person" as used in the Constitution and the laws of the United States.
